channel.title: data visualization on Sophia Baca
channel.description: Recent content in data visualization on Sophia Baca

item.title: Renewable Energy Momentum Index
item.description: Which nations offer the most attractive environment for renewable energy investments? To answer this question, my teammates and I created the Renewable Energy Momentum Index, a quantitative score encompassing each country’s market potential and receptivity to renewable energy.

item.title: NYC Taxi Streamlit
item.description: Recently I have been working with streamlit and azure. I took a sample of the NYC Taxi Dataset from Databricks. I imported it into a Python streamlit project that creates a dashboard that summarizes features.

item.title: Purchase Requisitions with Power BI Direct Query
item.description: This project created a Power BI report to track purchase requisitions (PRs) that are normally tracked across several external data stores. I worked with the database team to create a SQL Server view that summarizes all of the data needed for people to track their PRs The data was inmported into Power BI report using Direct Query The report was designed such that the user’s AD information was used to display only their pertinent PRs The report is shared via an on prem Power BI Report Server

item.title: Train Accidents in the U.S.
item.description: This project was an analysis of train incident and accident data. Exploratory data analysis was performed using tableau: Here is a picture of the figure i made:
